scripts.test: npm run build && c8 node test/run
scripts.test:sqlite: npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=sqlite c8 node test/run
scripts.test:mysql: npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=mysql c8 node test/run
scripts.test:postgres: npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=postgres c8 node test/run
scripts.test:redshift: npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=redshift c8 node test/run
scripts.test:mongodb: npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=mongodb c8 node test/run
scripts.test:docker:mysql: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm -e ORM_PROTOCOL=mysql test-runner bash -c 'npm ci && npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=mysql node test/run'
scripts.test:docker:postgres: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm -e ORM_PROTOCOL=postgres test-runner bash -c 'npm ci && npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=postgres node test/run'
scripts.test:docker:redshift: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm -e ORM_PROTOCOL=redshift test-runner bash -c 'npm ci && npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=redshift node test/run'
scripts.test:docker:mongodb: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm -e ORM_PROTOCOL=mongodb test-runner bash -c 'npm ci && npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=mongodb node test/run'
